concept.discription_1: You will form a group with other participants, and tackle a subject theme offered by a company!
concept.discription_3: Present your solution given our support and feedback.

features.title: connection to companies
discription: Its good opportunity to build relationship
There is even a chance of head-hunting

schedule.kickoff: form a group, and receive the subject

content.whom: University, Graduate school, High school, Vocational school and College of technology students
content.what_evaluate_1: Reality, social commitment, growth of the market,
content.caution: task progress based on schedule is also evaluated
content.coorporater: Nagaoka Working Organization for the Youth

vision.idea: Offer business-contest against corona for students
vision.name: Kazuki Yokoyama
vision.comment_1: Now, corona virus (COVID-19) has huge impact on the economics. You may be wondering what to do during social distancing. However, now it is opportunity to consider 'after corona' and 'with corona' world.
vision.comment_2: 'Online Intern Contest 2020-3' offer you opportunity to tackle corona problem with other students all over the world online.
vision.comment_3: We will especially welcome '21 or 22' who are worrying about job hunting and internship under this situation.
vision.comment_4: We, also encourage high school students to join us!
vision.comment_5: Participants from previous time as well as newcomers, let's make it possible!

sponsors.wait: We will announce detail information soon

disclaimer.agree: Apply after agreeing to the above.

about.message: Prossell is an ONCON(online contest) management team to make your job hunting successful.
